column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Mr. Feeeeng !
#Text=" Mr. Feng says : " Oh , thanks for grabbing him , Bolin .
#Text=He 's been trying to escape ever since he figured out I 'm going to feed him to the new pythonaconda I just got in .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=You 're going to turn him into a snake snack ?
#Text=Wait , I 'll buy him .
#Text=How much ?
#Text=" Mr. Feng says : " Five yuans .
#Text=" Mako says : " No , the last thing we need is one more mouth to feed .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But it 's such a tiny mouth !
#Text=Pleeeaase ?
#Text=We ca n't just leave him for snake food !
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin !
#Text=You have to toughen up !
#Text=Big animals eat the little animals , that 's just how it goes .
#Text=How much do you want to put on the match tonight , Mr. Feng ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey !
#Text=Toza !
#Text=" Toza says : " Oh .
#Text=You 're the kid who works with the Triple Threats .
#Text=What , does Shady Shin want me to belly - flop into the pool so I 'm extra humiliated tonight ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I just wanted to say , you do n't have to throw the fight .
#Text=I mean ... you 're the best !
#Text=" Toza says : " I was the best .
#Text=But now my body and my bank account are exactly the same : broke .
#Text=I made my decision !
#Text=Leave me alone !
#Text=" Mako says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=Are you trying to get us in trouble with Shady Shin ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=I just ... Maybe I 'm not as mean as you !
#Text=Maybe I just ca n't turn my back on people when they 're down !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Little fire ferret .
#Text=Helloo ?
#Text=I got you buddy .
#Text=Huh , looks like that snake was n't hungry after all .
#Text=I wonder where he i — " Mako says : " You really have a knack for getting into stupid situations , you know that ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , thanks Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " C'mon , we should get out of here .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , not without him .
#Text=" Mako says : " All right .
#Text=But his food comes out of your half .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hooray !
#Text=You 're with us now , Pabu !
#Text=" Bolin says : " I named him Pabu .
#Text=" Mako says : " How did you come up with that ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I do n't know .
#Text=It just kind of came to me while the snake was strangling me .
#Text=Oxygen deprivation gives you some good ideas .
#Text="
